definition: The term refers to the extent or distance that can be covered or reached by something, typically used to describe the range or reach of a particular object, device, or system. It often pertains to the distance a vehicle can travel on a single charge or tank of fuel, or the range of a wireless signal.

examples.german: Die Reichweite des Radiosenders beträgt 100 Kilometer.
examples.english: The range of the radio station is 100 kilometers.

examples.german: Das Elektroauto hat eine Reichweite von 300 Kilometern.
examples.english: The electric car has a range of 300 kilometers.

examples.german: Die Reichweite des WLAN-Signals ist zu schwach.
examples.english: The range of the Wi-Fi signal is too weak.

examples.german: Die Reichweite des Fernsehers beträgt 10 Meter.
examples.english: The range of the television is 10 meters.

examples.german: Die Reichweite der Rakete reicht bis zum Mond.
examples.english: The range of the rocket extends to the moon.
